instructions: In the Phone app , tap Keypad, enter a number, then tap Add Number. Tap Create New Contact, or Add to Existing Contact, then select a contact.
In the Phone app , tap Recents, then tap the More Info button next to the number. Tap Create New Contact, or Add to Existing Contact, then select a contact.

If you prefer to type a reply, wake your iPhone, then double-click the Home button to show the App Switcher. (On iPhone X and later, swipe up from the bottom edge and pause to show the App Switcher.) Tap the button that appears at the bottom of the screen to open the email in Mail.
